statements: SELECT * FROM employee_credentials ORDER BY first_name ASC, last_name DESC
SELECT employee_id, first_name, email FROM employee_credentials WHERE certification_type = 'Software Engineering'
SELECT first_name, last_name, certification_date FROM employee_credentials WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM employee_credentials WHERE employee_id = 12345
SELECT email FROM employee_credentials WHERE first_name = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM employee_credentials WHERE certification_type = 'IT' ORDER BY certification_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employee_credentials WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT certification_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM employee_credentials GROUP BY certification_type ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, certification_date FROM employee_credentials WHERE certification_type = 'Admin' AND certification_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM employee_credentials WHERE first_name = 'John' OR last_name = 'Smith'
SELECT * FROM employee_credentials;
SELECT username, password FROM employee_credentials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_credentials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM employee_credentials WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT certification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, username, password FROM employee_credentials WHERE employee_id = 50 AND username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, expiration_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name IN ('AWS Certification', 'Google Certification');
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT full_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM credentials WHERE expiration_date < CURDATE();
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, issuing_body FROM certifications ORDER BY employee_id ASC, issue_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM credentials WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT full_name, issuing_body FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.employee_id = certifications.employee_id;
SELECT full_name, email, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM credentials WHERE issue_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, compliance_type, status FROM compliance ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM credentials WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, username FROM employees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, issue_date, expiry_date FROM certifications WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT record_description FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT cert_id, certification_name, issue_date, expiry_date FROM certifications WHERE employee_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT role_id, role_name, department FROM employee_roles WHERE employee_id = 3;
